title: The private chain runs out of question, and the original data is lost.
body:
#### System information

OS & Version: Linux

Why do you use such an old geth version? Can you try the latest stable release?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
